attributes.action: prevent the new Bill that will raise the school leaving age from 16 to 18
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As it stands the government want to raise the school leaving age from 16 to 17, and then to 18 by 2013.  This means it will be mandatory for all young people to stay in education/training for an extra two years.  This directly violates peoples' freedom of choice.  Also, many people (76%) willingly choose to stay on until 18 anyway.
